name: System
description: The System plugin provides access to the Construct engine.

conditions.name: Is within angle
conditions.description: Compare if an angle is within X degrees of another angle.

params.name: Angle 1
params.description: Angle in degrees to test.

params.name: Within
params.description: Number of degrees that angle 1 must be within angle 2.

params.name: Angle 2
params.description: Angle in degrees to test angle 1 against.

conditions.name: Is clockwise from
conditions.description: Compare if an angle is clockwise from another angle.

params.name: Angle 1
params.description: Angle in degrees to test.

params.name: Angle 2
params.description: Angle in degrees to test if angle 1 is clockwise from.

conditions.name: Is between angles
conditions.description: Compare if an angle is between two angles.

params.name: Angle
params.description: Angle in degrees to test if between the first and second angles.

params.name: First angle
params.description: First angle in degrees. Specify in clockwise order.

params.name: Second angle
params.description: Second angle in degrees. Specify in clockwise order.

conditions.name: Every tick
conditions.description: Run the actions once every tick, a.k.a. 'Always'.

conditions.name: Compare two values
conditions.description: Compare two arbitrary values.  This condition does not pick any objects.

params.name: First value
params.description: Enter the first value to compare.  This condition does not pick any objects - it is a simple value comparison.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Select the way to compare the values.

params.name: Second value
params.description: Enter the second value to compare.  This condition does not pick any objects - it is a simple value comparison.

conditions.name: Is group active
conditions.description: Test if an event group is currently active.

params.name: Group name
params.description: The name of the event group to test if active.

conditions.name: Is between values
conditions.description: Compare if a number is between two values.

params.name: Value
params.description: Enter the value to compare.

params.name: Lower bound
params.description: The lower value to compare to.

params.name: Upper bound
params.description: The upper value to compare to.

conditions.name: Object UID exists
conditions.description: Check if an object with a given UID currently exists.

params.name: UID
params.description: Enter the UID of an object to check if exists.

conditions.name: Test regex
conditions.description: Test if a string matches a regular expression.

params.name: String
params.description: Enter a string to test the regular expression against.

params.name: Regex
params.description: Enter the regular expression to test the string with.

params.name: Flags
params.description: Regular expression flags. i = ignore case, g = global match, m = multiline.

conditions.name: Is number NaN
conditions.description: Check if a number is the special NaN (Not A Number) value.

params.name: Number
params.description: A number to check if matching the special NaN (Not A Number) value.

conditions.name: Is value type
conditions.description: Test if a value is a number or a string.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to check the type of.

params.name: Type
params.description: Check which type the value is.

conditions.name: Compare variable
conditions.description: Compare the value of a global or local variable.

params.name: Variable
params.description: Choose the variable to compare.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the variable.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to compare to the variable.

conditions.name: Is boolean set
conditions.description: Test if a boolean global or local variable is true.

params.name: Variable
params.description: Choose the variable to test if true.

conditions.name: Layer is visible
conditions.description: Test if a layer is currently visible.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of layer to check visibility for.

conditions.name: Compare opacity
conditions.description: Compare the opacity of a layer.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of layer to compare opacity.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Select the way to compare the layer opacity.

params.name: Opacity
params.description: The opacity to compare to, from 0 (transparent) to 100 (opaque).

conditions.name: On canvas snapshot
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Snapshot canvas' when the snapshot is ready.

conditions.name: Effects are supported
conditions.description: True if shader effects are supported and can be displayed in the game.

conditions.name: Layer is empty
conditions.description: Test if a layer has no objects on it.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of layer to check if empty.

conditions.name: For
conditions.description: Repeat actions with an index variable.

params.name: Name
params.description: Choose the name of the loop.  This can be an empty string.

params.name: Start index
params.description: Start index of the loop range (inclusive).

params.name: End index
params.description: End index of the loop range (inclusive).

conditions.name: For Each
conditions.description: Repeat actions once for each instance of an object.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object for the loop.  The actions will repeat once for each instance of the object.

conditions.name: Repeat
conditions.description: Repeat actions a certain number of times.

params.name: Count
params.description: Number of times to repeat the actions.

conditions.name: While
conditions.description: Repeat so long as the rest of the conditions in the event are true.

conditions.name: For Each (ordered)
conditions.description: Repeat actions once for each instance of an object ordered by an expression.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object for the loop.  The actions will repeat once for each instance of the object.

params.name: Expression
params.description: Enter an expression to order the loop with, e.g. Sprite.X

params.name: Order
params.description: Whether to loop in ascending or descending order.

conditions.name: Pick nth instance
conditions.description: Pick just the nth instance from the currently picked instances of an object.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to pick an instance from.

params.name: Instance
params.description: Index of the instance to pick (0-based).

conditions.name: Pick random instance
conditions.description: Pick a single random instance from the currently picked instances of an object.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to pick a random instance from.

conditions.name: Pick all
conditions.description: Reset the picked instances to select all of them again.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to reset to pick all instances.

conditions.name: Pick by comparison
conditions.description: Pick instances of an object that meet a comparison.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to pick by comparing with.

params.name: Expression
params.description: Enter an expression referencing the chosen object. Instances that meet the comparison will be picked.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Choose how to compare the above expression for each object.

params.name: Value
params.description: Enter a value to compare the expression to for each instance. It can also reference the chosen object.

conditions.name: Pick by evaluate
conditions.description: Pick instances of an object by evaluating an expression.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to pick by evaluating.

params.name: Expression
params.description: Enter an expression referencing the chosen object. If nonzero, the instance will be picked.

conditions.name: Pick overlapping point
conditions.description: Pick the instances of an object type overlapping a point in the layout.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the objects to pick if overlapping a point.

params.name: X
params.description: The X co-ordinate to test if overlapping.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y co-ordinate to test if overlapping.

conditions.name: Pick last created
conditions.description: Pick the last created instance of an object type. Useful with 'Create object (by name)'.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to pick the last created instance from.

conditions.name: On save complete
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Save' action when the save has completed.

conditions.name: On save failed
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Save' action if the attempt to save failed.

conditions.name: On load complete
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Load' action when the load has completed.

conditions.name: On load failed
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Load' action when the slot failed to load, including if it hasn't been saved to yet.

conditions.name: Trigger once while true
conditions.description: Make a continuously true event trigger once only, when it first becomes true.  Place as the last condition.

conditions.name: Is in preview
conditions.description: True if the project is running as a preview rather than as an exported project.

conditions.name: Is on mobile device
conditions.description: True if being viewed on a mobile device.  This is an estimate and may not be perfectly accurate.

conditions.name: Else
conditions.description: Run if the previous event was not true.  Note this does not pick any instances (logic only).

conditions.name: Is on platform
conditions.description: Check if currently running on a specific platform, e.g. Android.

params.name: Platform
params.description: The platform to check. Note multiple options can be true at once (e.g. HTML5 website + Android).

conditions.name: On start of layout
conditions.description: Triggered at the start of the current layout.

conditions.name: On end of layout
conditions.description: Triggered at the end of the current layout.

conditions.name: On loader layout complete
conditions.description: Triggered on a loader layout when loading has finished.

conditions.name: Every X seconds
conditions.description: Run the actions at a regular time interval.

params.name: Interval (seconds)
params.description: Specify time, in seconds, between running the actions.  Interval is limited by the framerate (actions will not run more than once per tick).

conditions.name: Compare time
conditions.description: Compare the current time (seconds since startup)

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Choose the way to compare the current time.

params.name: Time (seconds)
params.description: The time (seconds since starting) to compare to.

conditions.name: On suspended
conditions.description: Triggered when the app goes in to the background, e.g. when switching browser tab or app.

conditions.name: On resumed
conditions.description: Triggered when the app is restored to the foreground after being suspended.

conditions.name: Is suspended
conditions.description: True if the app is currently suspended.

conditions.name: On image loading complete
conditions.description: Triggered when images loaded with the memory management actions have finished loading.

conditions.name: Is loading images
conditions.description: Test if images loaded with the memory management actions are currently in the process of loading.

conditions.name: Evaluate expression
conditions.description: True if a given expression is non-zero, or not an empty string. Useful with boolean expressions.

params.name: Value
params.description: Enter the value to evaluate. The condition is true if this evaluates to a non-zero value or a non-empty string.

conditions.name: Layer is interactive
conditions.description: Test if a layer is currently responding to mouse and touch input.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of layer to check if interactive.

conditions.name: Template exists
conditions.description: Check if the provided template name exists.

params.name: Object to test
params.description: Choose the object type where to look for the template name

params.name: Template name
params.description: The name of the template to check exists.

conditions.name: On signal
conditions.description: Triggered by the 'Signal' action with a matching tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag of the 'Signal' action.

conditions.name: Layer is HTML
conditions.description: Test if a layer is currently set to be an HTML layer.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of layer to check if an HTML layer.

conditions.name: Layer name exists
conditions.description: Test if a layer with a specific name currently exists.

params.name: Layer
params.description: The name of the layer to check exists.

conditions.name: Pick by highest/lowest value
conditions.description: Pick the instance which evaluates with the highest or lowest expression.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to pick.

params.name: Which
params.description: Choose whether to pick the instance with the highest or lowest expression.

params.name: Expression
params.description: Enter an expression referencing the chosen object.

actions.name: Snapshot canvas
actions.description: Take a snapshot of the current display.  Use the 'On canvas snapshot' trigger and 'CanvasSnapshot' expression to get the result.
actions.display_text: Take snapshot of canvas ({0}, quality [i]{1}[/i], offset [i]{2}[/i], [i]{3}[/i] size [i]{4}[/i] x [i]{5}[/i])

params.name: Format
params.description: Choose the file format to save the snapshot with. PNG is lossless but JPEG files are smaller.

params.name: JPEG quality
params.description: If 'Format' is 'JPEG', the JPEG quality from 0 (worst) to 100 (best). Ignored for PNG.

params.name: X
params.description: The X offset of the area to snapshot, in canvas device pixels.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y offset of the area to snapshot, in canvas device pixels.

params.name: Width
params.description: The width of the area to snapshot, in canvas device pixels. Leave 0 to use the full width.

params.name: Height
params.description: The height of the area to snapshot, in canvas device pixels. Leave 0 to use the full height.

actions.name: Set canvas size
actions.description: Set the size of the canvas (also altering the 'Window size' project property).

params.name: Width
params.description: The new width of the canvas, in pixels.

params.name: Height
params.description: The new height of the canvas, in pixels.

actions.name: Set fullscreen scaling
actions.description: Set the fullscreen scaling quality mode.

params.name: Fullscreen scaling
params.description: The new fullscreen scaling quality: whether to scale before (high quality) or after (low quality) rendering.

actions.name: Set pixel rounding
actions.description: Enable or disable pixel rounding mode at runtime.

params.name: Mode
params.description: The pixel rounding mode to set.

actions.name: Go to layout
actions.description: Jump to another layout in the project.

params.name: Layout
params.description: Choose the layout to go to.

actions.name: Create object
actions.description: Create a new instance of an object in the current layout.
actions.display_text: Create object {0} on layer [b]{1}[/b] at ([i]{2}[/i], [i]{3}[/i]), create hierarchy: [i]{4}[/i], template: [i]{5}[/i]

params.name: Object to create
params.description: Choose the object type of the new instance to create.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to create the instance on.

params.name: X
params.description: X co-ordinate at which to place the created instance.

params.name: Y
params.description: Y co-ordinate at which to place the created instance.

params.name: Create hierarchy
params.description: Whether to also create all child instances according to the hierarchy in the Layout View.

params.name: Template name
params.description: Use a specific instance as a template when creating a new object.

actions.name: Create object (by name)
actions.description: Create a new instance of an object in the current layout, using a string of the object name to create.
actions.display_text: Create object [b]{0}[/b] on layer [b]{1}[/b] at ([i]{2}[/i], [i]{3}[/i]), create hierarchy: [i]{4}[/i], template: [i]{5}[/i]

params.name: Object name
params.description: The name of the object type of the new instance to create.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to create the instance on.

params.name: X
params.description: X co-ordinate at which to place the created instance.

params.name: Y
params.description: Y co-ordinate at which to place the created instance.

params.name: Create hierarchy
params.description: Whether to also create all child instances according to the hierarchy in the Layout View.

params.name: Template name
params.description: Use a specific instance as a template when creating a new object.

actions.name: Set group active
actions.description: Activate or deactivate an event group.

params.name: Group name
params.description: The name of the event group to set active.

params.name: State
params.description: Choose whether to activate or deactivate the group.

actions.name: Stop loop
actions.description: Stop any currently running loop (for, for each, repeat).

actions.name: Go to layout (by name)
actions.description: Jump to another layout in the project, using a string for the layout name.

params.name: Layout
params.description: The name of the layout to go to.

actions.name: Restart layout
actions.description: Restart the current layout, and also restore any groups to their initial activation state.

actions.name: Go to next/previous layout
actions.description: Go to the next or previous layout.

params.name: Which
params.description: Whether to go to the next or the previous layout.

actions.name: Set value
actions.description: Set the value of a global or local variable.

params.name: Variable
params.description: Choose the variable to change.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to store in this variable.

actions.name: Add to
actions.description: Add to the value of a global or local variable.

params.name: Variable
params.description: Choose the variable to change.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to add to this variable.

actions.name: Subtract from
actions.description: Subtract from the value of a global or local variable.

params.name: Variable
params.description: Choose the variable to change.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to subtract from this variable.

actions.name: Set boolean
actions.description: Set the value of a boolean global or local variable.

params.name: Variable
params.description: Choose the variable to change.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to store in this boolean variable.

actions.name: Toggle boolean
actions.description: Invert the value of a boolean global or local variable.

params.name: Variable
params.description: Choose the variable to toggle.

actions.name: Reset global variables
actions.description: Reset all global variables in the project to their initial values.
actions.display_text: Reset global variables to default (include static: [i]{0}[/i])

params.name: Reset static
params.description: Check to also reset all static local variables in the project.

actions.name: Set layer visible
actions.description: Set the visibility of a layer.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to set visible.

params.name: Visibility
params.description: Choose whether the layer is drawn or not.

actions.name: Set layer scale
actions.description: Set an individual layer's scale (or 'zoom') to make it appear larger or smaller.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to set the scale for.

params.name: Scale
params.description: The layer scale (or 'zoom').  1.0 for original size, 2.0 for double size, etc.

actions.name: Set layer opacity
actions.description: Set an individual layer's opacity.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to set opacity for.

params.name: Opacity
params.description: The layer opacity, from 0 (transparent) to 100 (opaque).

actions.name: Set layer scale rate
actions.description: Set an individual layer's scale rate.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to set the scale rate for.

params.name: Scale rate
params.description: The scale rate to set.  1.0 for ordinary zoom, 2.0 for twice as much zoom, 0 for no zoom etc.

actions.name: Set layout scale
actions.description: Set the scale of the entire layout.

params.name: Scale
params.description: The overall scale of the layout.  1.0 for original size, 2.0 for double size, etc.

actions.name: Set layout angle
actions.description: Set the angle of the entire layout.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The angle to rotate the canvas view to, in degrees.

actions.name: Set layer angle
actions.description: Set an individual layer's angle.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to set the angle for.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The angle to rotate the layer to, in degrees.

actions.name: Set layout effect enabled
actions.description: Enable or disable an effect on the current layout.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to enable or disable the layout effect.

params.name: Effect
params.description: Choose the layout effect to modify. The effect must be present on the currently running layout.

actions.name: Set layer effect enabled
actions.description: Enable or disable an effect on a layer.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to modify.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to enable or disable the layer effect.

params.name: Effect
params.description: Choose the layer effect to modify.

actions.name: Set layout effect parameter
actions.description: Set the value of a parameter in one of the layout's effects.

params.name: Effect
params.description: Choose the layout effect to modify. The effect must be present on the currently running layout.

params.name: Parameter index
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the parameter to change, e.g. 0 = first param, 1 = second param, etc.

params.name: Value
params.description: Enter the new parameter value.

actions.name: Set layer effect parameter
actions.description: Set the value of a parameter in one of a layer's effects.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to modify.

params.name: Effect
params.description: Choose the layer effect to modify.

params.name: Parameter index
params.description: Enter the zero-based index of the parameter to change, e.g. 0 = first param, 1 = second param, etc.

params.name: Value
params.description: Enter the new parameter value.

actions.name: Set layer parallax
actions.description: Set the parallax rate of a layer.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to modify.

params.name: Parallax X
params.description: The horizontal scroll rate as a percentage (e.g. 50 for half speed).

params.name: Parallax Y
params.description: The vertical scroll rate as a percentage (e.g. 50 for half speed).

actions.name: Set layer background color
actions.description: Set the background color of a layer.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to modify.

params.name: Color
params.description: The color to set the layer background to.

actions.name: Set layer transparent
actions.description: Set a layer background to be transparent or opaque.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to modify.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether or not the layer is transparent.

actions.name: Set layer blend mode
actions.description: Change a layer's blend mode property.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to modify.

params.name: Blend mode
params.description: Choose the new blend mode for the layer.

actions.name: Reset persisted objects
actions.description: Reset all objects with the Persist behavior in all layouts to their initial state.

actions.name: Recreate initial objects
actions.description: Recreate the layout's initial objects within a rectangular area.
actions.display_text: Recreate initial {0} objects from ([i]{1}[/i], [i]{2}[/i]) to ([i]{3}[/i], [i]{4}[/i]) from layout [i]{5}[/i], source layer [i]{6}[/i], dest layer [i]{7}[/i], offset ([i]{8}[/i], [i]{9}[/i]), create hierarchy: [i]{10}[/i]

params.name: Object
params.description: The object type to re-create instances for.

params.name: From X
params.description: X co-ordinate of left edge to re-create.

params.name: From Y
params.description: Y co-ordinate of top edge to re-create.

params.name: To X
params.description: X co-ordinate of right edge to re-create.

params.name: To Y
params.description: Y co-ordinate of bottom edge to re-create.

params.name: Source layout
params.description: Name of the layout to take objects from. Leave empty to use the current layout.

params.name: Source layer
params.description: Name or zero-based index of layer on source layout to take objects from. Use -1 to recreate objects from all layers.

params.name: Offset X
params.description: Amount to offset the X positions of the created objects.

params.name: Offset Y
params.description: Amount to offset the Y positions of the created objects.

params.name: Create hierarchy
params.description: Whether to also create all child instances according to the hierarchy in the Layout View.

params.name: Destination layer
params.description: Name or zero-based index of layer on current layout to create objects on. Use -1 to match the original layers.

actions.name: Set layer force own texture
actions.description: Set a layer's 'Force own texture' mode.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to modify.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether or not to force the layer to render via its own texture.

actions.name: Save
actions.description: Save the full state of the game to the local computer.

params.name: Slot
params.description: A string identifying this save game state.

actions.name: Load
actions.description: Load the full state of the game from the local computer.

params.name: Slot
params.description: The slot that was previously saved to, from which to load from.

actions.name: Load from JSON
actions.description: Load the full state of the game from a JSON string.

params.name: JSON
params.description: A JSON string containing a save game state from which to load from.

actions.name: Scroll to X
actions.description: Scroll to an X co-ordinate.

params.name: X
params.description: X co-ordinate to scroll to, in pixels.

actions.name: Scroll to Y
actions.description: Scroll to an Y co-ordinate.

params.name: Y
params.description: Y co-ordinate to scroll to, in pixels.

actions.name: Scroll to position
actions.description: Scroll to a co-ordinate.

params.name: X
params.description: X co-ordinate to scroll to, in pixels.

params.name: Y
params.description: Y co-ordinate to scroll to, in pixels.

actions.name: Scroll to object
actions.description: Scroll to an object.

params.name: Object
params.description: Object to scroll to.

actions.name: Set time scale
actions.description: Change the rate time passes in the game, for slow-motion or pause effects.

params.name: Time scale
params.description: The new time scale: 1.0 = normal speed, 0.5 = half speed, 2.0 = double speed, 0 = pause, etc.

actions.name: Set object time scale
actions.description: Change the rate time passes for a specific object.  Overrides the game time scale.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to change timescale for.

params.name: Time scale
params.description: The new time scale for the object (1.0 = normal speed, 0.5 = half speed, etc).

actions.name: Restore object time scale
actions.description: Restore an object's time scale back to game time.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to restore timescale for.

actions.name: Wait
actions.description: Wait a number of seconds before running the next action.

params.name: Seconds
params.description: The number of seconds to wait before running the next action.

params.name: Use time scale
params.description: Uncheck to ignore the current time scale and wait in wall-clock time.

actions.name: Wait for signal
actions.description: Wait until a corresponding 'Signal' action is used.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag of the signal to wait for. This will wait until the corresponding 'Signal' action is used.

actions.name: Signal
actions.description: Trigger 'On signal' and resume any 'Wait for signal' actions.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag to signal.

actions.name: Sort Z order
actions.description: Sort an object's instance's Z order according to an instance variable.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object whose instances will have their Z order sorted.

params.name: Instance variable
params.description: The instance variable to use for sorting Z order by.

actions.name: Load object images
actions.description: Load the images for an object in to memory, if it isn't already loaded.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to load images for.

actions.name: Unload object images
actions.description: Unload the images for an object from memory, if it is loaded and all its instances are destroyed.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to unload images for.

actions.name: Unload unused images
actions.description: Unload the images for objects that are loaded and all instances are destroyed.

actions.name: Load layout images
actions.description: Load all the images used by a layout in to memory. Note this can result in high memory usage.
actions.display_text: Load layout [b]{0}[/b] images in to memory

params.name: Layout
params.description: The layout to load all images for.

actions.name: Load layout images (by name)
actions.description: Load all the images used by a layout (by a string of its name) in to memory. Note this can result in high memory usage.
actions.display_text: Load layout [b]{0}[/b] images in to memory

params.name: Layout
params.description: The name of the layout to load all images for.

actions.name: Load object images (by name)
actions.description: Load the images for an object in to memory by a string of the object name.

params.name: Object name
params.description: The name of the object to load images for.

actions.name: Unload object images (by name)
actions.description: Unload the images for an object from memory by a string of the object name.

params.name: Object name
params.description: The name of the object to unload images for.

actions.name: Set layer Z elevation
actions.description: Set the Z elevation of a layer.

params.name: Layer
params.description: Name or number of the layer to modify.

params.name: Z elevation
params.description: The Z elevation to set for the layer.

actions.name: Set return value
actions.description: In a function, set the value returned by the function when used as an expression.

params.name: Value
